title: Honor unlocked
body: I was banend for 14 days and it said that i couldnt get the end of season rewards but i read somewhere that if i unlock my honor again im eligible for the end of season rewards it this true? Am i now able to get my end of season rewards since i have unlocked my honor again?

replies.body: Getting a 14-day punishment after 8/22 disqualifies you from Ranked Rewards regardless of Honor rank.
